name: Woosh!
description:
A game made with Tea Party Studios and TheDuckDev
Jam version of game uploaded to :
Woosh! by The Duck (itch.io)

Important!

This version of game was planned originally, but since it had bugs and wasn't be able to fix it on time,  TheDuckDev uploaded sandbox version of it to jam.

Controls

You can place or edit rails with Left Mouse Button.

You can place straight rails while holding Shift key.

You can remove rails with Right Mouse Button.

You cannot edit rails or station rails and stations that exist on map.

Turn off Auto from bottom right corner to place rails without auto connecting feature.

Rail Signs:

-If you enable Rail Signs toggle on left corner, you can place these two signs which you can use only once:

Pressing 1 while your mouse is over on train track will place a stop sign which will stop train for 3 seconds on that track.

Pressing 2 while your mouse is over on train track will place a give way sign which will stop train if theres a train on next track and wait until the track is free.

Bugs

Feel free to report bugs below so I can polish game.
